title: Portfolio V2
description: Second iteration of my personal website, you're on it! Made with React + Vite, first designed in Figma before implementation.

title: MySpotifyGenome
description: Small app that generates musical DNA using PaperJS based on artist obscurity from a user's top artists this month on Spotify.

title: Virginia iGEM 2022
description: Virginia iGEM 2022 team website, developed for our synthetic biology project AtheroSHuffle: A Novel Point-of-Care Detection Method for Early Atherosclerosis. Largest (and first) web project I've ever developed.
